MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the SY14 Postcode area of Malpas. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown, due to faulty electrical equipment on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.13AM on 15th December 2020.
